maqras.text: 25|21|Ware to no (shinpan no tame no) kaiken o nozomanai mono wa iu. `Naze tenshi ga watashi-tachi ni kudasa renai no ka. Mata (naze) watashi-tachi no omo ga,-me no mae ni mienai nodearou ka.' Kare-ra wa hontōni unuborete kōmandeari, mata hijō ni ōheina taido o totta nodearu.
25|22|Kare-ra ga tenshi o miru hi, tsumibito ni totte, yorokobi no nai hidearu. Kare-ra (tenshi) wa iudearou. ` (Anata gata ni wa) kinji rarete iru, tōzakare.'
25|23|Ware wa kare-ra no okonatta koto ni mukuite, sore o chiri no yō ni makichirasudearou.
25|24|Rakuen no nakama wa sonohi, subarashī sumai ni ochitsuite, kokoroyoi hirune-sho ni iyou.
25|25|Sonohi, ten wa kumo to tomoni sake, tenshi-tachi ga tsukawasa re (taikyo shite) kudaru.
25|26|Sonohi, shin no taiken wa, jihibukaki okata ni zokusuru. Fushin-sha ni totte wa, tanan no hidearu.
25|27|Sonohi, aku o okonatta mono wa,(shimatta to,) sono-te o (kami), iudearou. `Ā , watashi ga moshi shito to tomoni (tadashī) michi o erande itanaraba.
25|28|Ā, nasakenai, watashi ga an'na mono o tomo to shinakattanaraba.
25|29|Hontōni kare wa, kunkai ga kudatta nochi ni watashi o mayowa seta nodesu. Akuma wa tsuneni ningen o uragirimasu.'
25|30|Shito wa iu. `Omo yo, hontōni watashi no hitobito wa, kono kuruān o imubeki mono to shite kyohi shimasu.'
25|31|Ware wa kono yō ni, sorezore no yogen-sha ni, tsumibukaki-sha-tachi no naka kara teki o tsukuru. Daga shidō-sha, enjo-sha to shite wa anata no omo dakede jūbundearu.

25|32|Mata shinkō shinai mono wa,`kuruān wa naze ichido ni zenkan ga kudasa renai nodesu ka.' To iu. Kō suru no wa, ware ga anata no kokoro o kengo ni suru tame, yoku totonoete junjoyoku fukushō sa seru tamedearu.
25|33|Mata, kare-ra ga 譬 O, anata ni mochidashite kuru tabi ni shinri to zen no kaishaku (no tegakari) o anata ni ataeru tamedearu.
25|34|Kao o utsumukete jigoku ni atsume rareru-sha, korera wa aku no kyōchi ni oka reru, hidoku michinimayotta-shadearu.
25|35|(Kore yori saki) ware wa mūsā ni keiten o sazuke, sono kyōdai hārūn o agete kare no hojo-sha to shita.
25|36|Ware wa sonotoki (meijite) itta. `Anata gata ryōnin wa, waga shirushi o kyohi suru min no moto ni ike.' Sorede ware wa, kare-ra o tetteiteki ni 懲 Shimete kaimetsu shita.
25|37|Mata nūfu no min wa shito o kyohi shitanode, ware wa kare-ra o obore sasete, hitobito e no shirushi to shita. Ware wa aku o okonau mono no tame ni, itamashī chōbatsu o junbi shite iru.
25|38|Mata ādo to samūdo to rassu no jūmin-tachi, soshite sonoaida no iku sedai.
25|39|Ware wa sorezore no min ni jitsurei o motte keikoku shi, mata (sono tsumi ni taishi) sorezore o tetteiteki ni kaimetsu shita.
25|40|Kare-ra (fushin-sha) wa, wazawai no ame o dotto fura sa reta machi o, tabitabi otozurete iru. Kare-ra wa sore o minakatta no ka, iya, kare-ra wa fukkatsu no hi nado omoi mo yoranakatta nodearu.
25|41|Kare-ra ga anata o miru toki, tada reishō no-teki ni suru dakedearu. (Soshite iu. ) `Arrā ga, shito to shite tsukawasa reta no wa, kono-shadearu no ka.

25|42|Moshi watashi-tachi ga kamigami ni taishi, shikkari shite inakattanaraba, kare wa ayauku sore kara madowashi denrai no kamigami o misuteru tokorodeatta.'Daga, yagate chōbatsu o miru toki, dare ga, mottomo michinimayotta ka ga wakarudearou.
25|43|Anata wa jibun no omowaku o,-shin to shite (omoikomu)-sha o mita no ka. Anata wa kare-ra no gādian ni naru tsumorina no ka.
25|44|Soretomo kare-ra no ōku wa mimi o katamuke, matawa satoru to demo omotte iru no ka. Kare-ra wa kachiku no yōna mono ni suginai. Iya, sore yori mo michi kara mayotte iru.
25|45|Omo wa ikaga ni kage o hiroge rareta ka, anata wa minakatta no ka. Moshi kare ga o nozominaraba, sore o seishishita mama ni sa reyou. Sorekara ware wa, taiyō o sono an'nai-yaku to shita.
25|46|Sokode ware wa, yuruyakana ashidori de ware no kata ni hikiyoseru.
25|47|Kare koso wa, anata gata no tame ni yoru o tobari to sa re, suimin shite kyūsoku sa se, hiruma o yomigaeri (no toki) to nasa reta okatadearu.
25|48|Mata kare koso wa, sono jiu o furasu mae ni, kippō no kaze o fuki okosu okatadearu. Soshite ware wa, ten kara seijōna ame o furasu.
25|49|Ware wa sore de shinda daichi ni seimei o atae, mata ware ga tsukutta musū no kachiku ya ningen ni noma sete yaru.
25|50|Ware wa kare-ra ga kidzuku yō ni, kare-ra no ma de kore o kurikaeshi (te kaimei shi)ta. Daga dai tasū no ningen wa, tada kobamu dakedeatta.
25|51|Ware ga moshi nozomunaraba, dono machi ni mo keikoku-sha o 1-ri dzutsu tsukawashitadearou.
25|52|Dakara fushin-sha ni shitagatte wa naranai. Kare-ra ni taishi kono (kuruān) o motte ōini funtō doryoku shi nasai.
